commenter_b: As a veteran educator with 31 years experience, I am appalled by Betsy DeVos's level of complete and utter incompetence. Shame on you, Donald Trump, for promoting her, and shame on you, Betsy DeVos, for accepting a position for which you have zero aptitude.
